items.sentence: Tom couldn't believe Mary had agreed to go out with him.
It's a good thing we didn't try to do that by ourselves.
The only way to get to Tom's house from here is on foot.
Was Tom the one who told you that you shouldn't do that?
I agree with the opinion that real estate is overpriced.
Tom has told me that he's planning to move to Australia.
You won't know if you can do that or not unless you try.
Tom didn't even bother going to his graduation ceremony.
You're the only one who survived the attack, aren't you?
You're going to have to do better than that, aren't you?

You're the one who taught me how to do this, aren't you?

That restaurant prepares two thousand lunches every day.
